sense.gloss: drawing a line (esp. through an entry in a ledger, record book, etc.), striking out, crossing out
indicating a long vowel with a long-vowel mark, long-vowel mark
tug of war played with a pole

sdata.j: ↑間違↑↓まちが↓ったら、そのまま↑棒引↑↓|ぼうび↓き|で↑消↑↓け↓しておいてください。
sdata.e: If you make a mistake, just cross it out neatly.
